original_title: くノ一忍法伝 天使と悪魔
overview: The sexually charged action film Ninja Vixens: Devilish Angels concerns a member of the attractive, brutal group who ends up caring for an orphan. She attempts to keep the more unsavory aspects of her life away from the girl, but these harsh facts come to light after bad guys set a nefarious plot into motion.
tagline: Ninja Vixens Slice Apart Heaven and Earth in This Lust Thriller!
title: Ninja Vixens: Devilish Angels
